WorkItem.Description: I am expecting the Control Toolkit release for months. I am in a situation to implement a Ribbon control in my application. I don't want to waste my time in building the Ribbon since Microsoft has announced that they are going to release it by the this year. Could anyone tell me when that would be ready?
WorkItem.Summary: Is this Control Toolkit release contain Ribbon Control too?

Comments.Message: Ribbon V1 will be available in mid-2009.  You can try out the CTP today - find instructions here: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Wiki/View.aspx?title=WPF%20Ribbon%20Preview
